br.gov.sp.fatec.mapskills.restapi

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.gov.sp.fatec.mapskills.restapi.AdminController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin")
public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
    A classe AdminController eh responsavel por conter todos end-points de servico do perfil administrador da aplicacao.
    Version:
    1.0 03/01/2017
    Author:
    Marcelo
